deploy(uint32).details: Deploys all the tokens for the specified pools

params.amountIn: The exact amount of the input to swap
params.tokenIn: The address of the input token
params.tokenOut: The address of the output token

returns.amountOut: The estimated amount of tokenOut to receive

params.amountIn: The exact amount of the input to swap
params.tokenIn: The address of the input token
params.tokenOut: The address of the output token

returns.amountOutMinimum: The minimum amount of tokenOut to receive, factoring in allowable slippage

harvestYield().details: Harvests token yield from the integration

params._tokenA: The address of the first  token from the token pair
params._tokenB: The address of the second token from the token pair return true if pool exist else overwise
